title: Wurm Unlimited [WRC] 03.23.2016
description:
[center][size=200][b]Join our Wurm Unlimited private server![/b][/size][/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/134UhAK.jpg?1[/img][/center]

No side-apps required, just install the game, and use the desktop shortcut, or use [b]updater.cmd[/b] to launch the game.

Client version : [b]1.0.0.3 [/b]


We have migrated to a new server, to resolve some lag issues we had with the old one.
We made an updater to adapt client version to the one currently used by the server, so once you have downloaded this client, you're set!


[b]INSTALL:[/b]
1) Launch Wurm Unlimited installer.exe
2) Launch Updater.cmd or use desktop shorcut 
4) Enter your character name and hit "Connect to WRC"
5) Click "Connect" (IP address of the server should already be correct)
6) Enjoy!


[size=200]About WRC server:[/size]
PVE Kingdom server, with Hota and arena pvp zones
Size 4096x4096
Skillgain Rate 4x, Action Speed 4x.
Deed Cost And Upkeep Enabled At 50% Of The Default Rates.
Active staff and regular events.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/BrCHpkY.jpg?1[/img]
